content: निविद् {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> (generally in the {%<ab>caus.</ab>%}) {@--1@} To tell, communicate, inform (with <ab>dat.</ab>); उपस्थितां होमवेलां गुरवे निवेदयामि <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; काश्यपाय वनस्पतिसेवां निवेदयावः {%<ab>ibid.</ab>%}, <ls>R. 2. 68.</ls> {@--2@} To declare or announce oneself; कथमात्मानं निवेदयामि <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> {@--3@} To indicate, betray, show; शंकापीरग्रहनिवेदयिता <ls>Mu. 1</ls>; दिगंबरत्वेन निवेदितं वसु <ls>Ku. 5. 72</ls>; <ls>R. 17. 40.</ls> {@--4@} To offer, present, give, make an offer of; स्वराज्यं चंद्रापीडाय न्यवेदयत् <ls>K. 367</ls>; राज्यमस्मै न्यवेदयत् <ls>R. 15. 70</ls>, <ls n="R.">11. 47</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 51</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 27.</ls> {@--5@} To entrust to the care of, make or deliver over to.
निविद् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} Speech, a short Vedic text. {@--2@} Instruction, precept, direction. {@--3@} Invocation.
